title: Advice to a Prophet - "The dolphin's arc..."

content.question: The speaker implies that without “The dolphin’s arc, the dove’s return” (line 24), we would

choices.label: be less worried about war and destruction
crave coarser pleasures than the enjoyment of nature
have less understanding of ourselves and our lives
find ourselves unwilling to heed the advice of prophets

content.answer: have less understanding of ourselves and our lives

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
